fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use the factional kill to plant a Time Bomb on a player during the night.
- Plant a Satchel Charge on a player during the night. (1-shot)
- Defuse a Time Bomb or Satchel Charge during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Time Bomb will explode at the end of the next night, dealing a Powerful attack to the target and anyone who visits them. A player will not be informed if they have a Time Bomb.
- Depending on how the target dies, the Satchel Charge will do one of the following:
- If the target is nightkilled, anyone who visited the target on the night of death will be hit with a Powerful Attack.
- If the target is lynched or otherwise daykilled, the Satchel Charge will kill half of the people responsible for their death, rounding up.
- Defusing a Time Bomb or Satchel Charge will prevent it from exploding.
- You will know if any member of the Mafia has been targeted by a Time Bomb or Satchel Charge.
